item.title: Reverse Engineering Claude's Token Counter
item.description: Claude 3+ doesn’t ship with an open tokenizer. If you’re building coding agents, that’s a practical problem. You either call Anthropic’s count_tokens for everything (slow, online, awkward) or use a proxy estimator (tiktoken, wc -c // {3,4}) and accept large systematic error - up to 20–50% for Claude models. As agents increasingly self-manage context, they need a fast, local way to see token usage across a directory — cloc (count lines of code), but for tokens.
